mod.name: Guardian Mod
mod.description:
Adds a new playable enemy character: The Guardian. 
 
 If you like the mod and want to support me, check out my multiplayer party game, Sumo, in Early Access on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/858960/Sumo/ 
 
 Credit: @FreshBoneArt for Guardian fanart used in character select. kiooeht - The god.  Reina - relic preview code. 
 Special Thanks: Kio, Reina, Blank the Evil, Evil Pickle, JohnnyDevo, Skyson, Chronometrics, kobting, moocowgoesmoo and the rest of the Discord community for all the help.  Shoutout to Rhapsody (YouTube) for all the modded content creation! 
 Localization Credit: KOR - Dalamzi & Tokbum. ZHS - Rita-Bernstein. 
 
 Endless Thanks to my Patreon Supporters - Rhapsody, Alvin Tsang

cards.name: Orb Slam
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage !GuardianMulti! times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Orb Slam+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage !GuardianMulti! times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Ancients
cards.description:
Add an Ancient Attack, Ancient Power, and Ancient Construct to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Ancients+
cards.description:
Add an Ancient Attack, Ancient Power, and Ancient Construct to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Bronze
cards.description:
Add a Hyper Beam, Bronze Orb, and Bronze Armor to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Bronze+
cards.description:
Add a Hyper Beam, Bronze Orb, and Bronze Armor to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Defect
cards.description:
Add a Reroute, Preprogram, and Time Capacitor to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Defect+
cards.description:
Add a Reroute, Preprogram, and Time Capacitor to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Orbwalker

Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Orbwalker+
cards.description:
Add an Orbwalk, Walker Claw, and Incinerate to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Sentry
cards.description:
Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Sentry+
cards.description:
Add a Sentry Beam and two Sentry Waves to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Shapes
cards.description:
Add a Time Bomb, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Shapes+
cards.description:
Add a Time Bomb, Spiker Protocol, and Repulsor to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Spheric
cards.description:
Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Package: Spheric+
cards.description:
Add a Spheric Shield, Harden, and Floating Orbs to your hand, Upgrade them, and reduce their costs by 1 this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.description: At the end of combat, you may choose a Common Gem to add to your deck.

cards.description:
Deal 40 damage to ALL enemies.
Strength affects this card 3 times.

Strength affects this card 3 times.

cards.description:
Gem.
Gain 1 Artifact. Lose 1 HP.

cards.description:
When Defensive Mode is removed, gain 1 Strength for each turn it was active.
Gain 2 Defensive_Mode.

cards.name: Revenge Protocol+
cards.description:
When Defensive Mode is removed, gain 1 Strength for each turn it was active.
Gain 3 Defensive_Mode.

cards.name: Spheric Shield
cards.description:
For 2 turns, Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
Gain 15 Block.
Gain Defensive_Mode.

cards.name: Spheric Shield+
cards.description:
For 3 turns, Block is not removed at the start of your turn.
Gain 15 Block.
Gain Defensive_Mode.

cards.name: Spot Weakpoint
cards.description:
Whenever targeted enemy takes damage, gain 1 Momentary Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spot Weakpoint+
cards.description:
Whenever targeted enemy takes damage, gain 1 Momentary Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stasis Engine
cards.description: For every 3rd 0-cost card you play, gain [E] and draw a card.

cards.name: Stasis Engine+
cards.description:
Innate.
For every 3rd 0-cost card you play, gain [E] and draw a card.

cards.name: Time Sifter
cards.description: At the end of your turn, Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis with a turn counter of 2 or more.

cards.name: Time Sifter+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, Accelerate the right-most card in Stasis with a turn counter of 2 or more.

relics.name: Mode Shifter
relics.description:
When you lose 10 HP, gain 3 Defensive Mode and 15 Block.
When activated, Block will not be removed at the start of your next turn.
Each activation increases the amount of HP loss required to activate again by 5.
relics.flavorText: Protection where you need it most.

relics.name: Bronze Armor Plate
relics.description: When you use a card while in Defensive Mode, gain 1 more Block.
relics.flavorText: One can never have enough armor.

relics.name: Pocket Sentry
relics.description:
At the start of each turn, alternates between:
Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Sentry Mode active. Target acquired. No hard feelings.

relics.name: Rhapsody Co. Mining Pick
relics.description: You can Mine for two Gems at up to 3 Rest Sites.
relics.flavorText: With as many gemstones that litter the Spire, it is hard to imagine anyone so unlucky to have needed this Pick to aid them.

relics.name: Construct's Codex
relics.description: If you end your turn with no cards in Stasis, choose 1 of 3 cards to place into Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Designs and diagrams of the Spire's earliest prototypes.

relics.name: Cooling Fluid
relics.description: When a card with a Tick effect enters Stasis, increase it's turn counter by 2.

relics.name: Cryo Chamber
relics.description: When a card enters Stasis, Upgrade it.
relics.flavorText: Things always seem better coming out than they did going in.

relics.name: Sack of Gems
relics.description: Upon pickup, add 5 random Gems to your deck.

relics.name: Quantum Chamber
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Card. Start each combat with this card removed from your deck. At the start of your 4th turn, return it and two copies of it to your hand.
relics.flavorText: You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.

relics.name: Evacuation Plans
relics.description:
On pickup, lose 2 Stasis slots.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Instructions for escaping the Spire. Best not to let them fall into the wrong hands.

relics.name: Guardian Gear
relics.description:
Replaces Mode Shifter.
Begin each combat with 5 Defensive Mode.

relics.name: Bottled Black Hole
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Card. Start each combat with this card in Stasis.
relics.flavorText: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

keywords.name: Accelerate
keywords.description: Reduce the turn counter of a card in Stasis by 1. If the card's turn counter is now 0, return it to your hand at 0-cost.

keywords.name: Defensive mode
keywords.description: While in Defensive Mode, you have 3 Thorns, deal 25% less damage, and gain 2 Block when you play a card.

keywords.name: Gem
keywords.description: Gems can be placed into Sockets in cards at a Rest Site. Cannot be upgraded.

keywords.name: Momentary
keywords.description: A Momentary buff effect also adds a debuff effect which causes you to lose the buff's effect at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Orb slam
keywords.description: Orb Slams are 0 cost Attack cards which deal damage twice, and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Package
keywords.description: 0-cost Exhausting Skill that generates three cards inspired by a chosen Construct of the Spire, and reduces their cost by 1 for this combat.

keywords.name: Sentry beam
keywords.description: 0-cost Exhausting Attack that deals 5 damage (+2 Upgraded), and places a Sentry Wave into Stasis.

keywords.name: Sentry wave
keywords.description: 0-cost Exhausting Skill that applies 1 Weak (to ALL if Upgraded), draws 1 card, and places a Sentry Beam into Stasis.

keywords.name: Socket
keywords.description: Gems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site to combine the Gem's effect with this card's effect.

keywords.name: Stasis
keywords.description:
A card in Stasis gains a turn counter equal to its cost plus 1.
Turn counter is reduced by 1 at the start of your turn.
When the counter reaches 0, it is returned to your hand and becomes 0-cost until played.

keywords.name: Tick
keywords.description: This effect is triggered whenever this card's turn counter is reduced while in Stasis.

keywords.name: Volatile
keywords.description: When this card leaves Stasis, Exhaust it instead of returning it to your hand.

keywords.name: Ward
keywords.description: Wards are 0 cost Block cards which Exhaust.
